fields.name: Paracetamol
fields.description: Used for pain relief and fever reduction.

fields.name: Ibuprofen
fields.description: Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) for pain and inflammation.

fields.name: Amoxicillin
fields.description: Antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.

fields.name: Metformin
fields.description: Used to control blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.

fields.name: Omeprazole
fields.description: Proton pump inhibitor used to reduce stomach acid.

fields.name: Amlodipine
fields.description: Used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain.

fields.name: Azithromycin
fields.description: Antibiotic used for various bacterial infections.
